content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://stsynapselpcmi5wcehtio.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsefs/Loan_Default.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) WITH
    (
        [Batch Enrolled] VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
        [Grade] VARCHAR(6) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
        [Sub Grade] VARCHAR(6) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
        [Employment Duration] VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
        [Verification Status] VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
        [Payment Plan] VARCHAR(5) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
        [Loan Title] VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
        [Initial List Status] VARCHAR(5) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
        [Application Type] VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
    )
    AS [result]
